alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Craighead, Poinsett and northeastern Cross Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Grubbs to near Harrisburg to 6 miles north of Parkin. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Harrisburg, Bono, Parkin, Weiner, Cherry Valley, Cash, Egypt, Waldenburg, Greenfield, Payneway, Apt, Valley View, Weona Junction, Promised Land, Bay Village, Coldwater, Judd Hill and Pitts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
